Banner.Description: I have 1.5 years of experience developing systems, interfaces, and technological solutions to make the web a better place. I am dedicated to writing and refactoring clean, reusable, and scalable code in Angular and javascript, applying good practices and development standards.
AboutMe.Title: About Me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: In 1.5 years of experience I have covered many roles: , Frontend Developer, Backend Developer, and I love contributing my knowledge to create new things that help solve problems.
My capabilities also include implementing system improvements, optimizing sites, standardizing patterns, and suggesting and executing ideas that add value to the project I am working on.
I also program things for my personal use, whether for hobby or utility.
Some of the technologies I have trained and worked with include:
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Fullstack Developer
Description: Currently working with Koktail Soft Pvt. Ltd. Pune as a Angular Developer.
Experienced team player with excellent communication and interpersonal skills, capable of working independently under pressure.
Proficient in end-to-end product development, including client-side requirement gathering and infrastructure/ecosystem setup.
Well-versed in Agile methodology and scrum practices. Skilled in UI development and integration.
Quick learner with the ability to grasp new technologies, ideas, and concepts, and capable of motivating teams to meet tight deadlines.
Experience across various phases of SDLC, including Requirements, Analysis, Design, Development, Implementation, and Testing.

FeatureProjects.Title: My Projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Highlighted Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: HR CONNECT
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: HR CONNECT revolutionizes HR management with a centralized platform for automating tasks, tracking employee data, managing recruitment, conducting evaluations, and improving communication. Built with Angular and Java, it Technologies Angular, Java, JavaScript, and more.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: LAGNAKARYA
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Lagnakarya Vivahsanstha facilitates Marathi matrimony connections with features for match searching, customization, and community engagement. made with Angular and javascriptThe Rx.js library is applied.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: KusumVatika
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Application for tracking fuel supply requests for aircraft. It has an email module, real-time notifications, CSV file handling for data import, price quotes. Developed in Angular and javascript.

Contact.Title: Say Hi!
Contact.Content: I will be glad to hear from you if you want to discuss new opportunities. Write to me, and I will respond as soon as I see your message.
